nodes.text: Anbav'k was a Gree equipment master of the Gree Enclave during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire, when the Gree could be found on the Republic's Valor-class cruiser Gav Daragon.

Enclave Equipment Master Anbav'k was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.2, as a Nightmare Force Vendor for Operation: Terror From Beyond, though Anbav'k was later removed in a reorganizing of endgame gear.
